categories.name: Family
categories.description: Movies suitable for all ages and family viewing.

categories.name: Action-packed
categories.description: Movies filled with action, fast-paced scenes, and high-intensity.

categories.name: Classic
categories.description: Timeless films considered culturally significant or influential.

categories.name: Award-winning
categories.description: Movies that have received significant recognition and accolades.

categories.name: Animated
categories.description: Movies that feature animation, whether traditional or computer-generated.

categories.name: Blockbusters
categories.description: Movies with mass appeal, often with huge box office success.

movies.title: Inception
movies.description: A skilled thief is given a chance at redemption if he is able to successfully perform an inception, planting an idea into a target's subconscious.

movies.title: The Dark Knight
movies.description: Batman faces a new enemy, the Joker, who wants to plunge Gotham City into anarchy and chaos.

movies.title: Spider-Man: No Way Home
movies.description: Spider-Man's identity is exposed, and he seeks the help of Doctor Strange to make the world forget who he is.

movies.title: Dune
movies.description: A young nobleman becomes embroiled in a war over a valuable spice on the desert planet Arrakis.

movies.title: The Matrix Resurrections
movies.description: Neo lives a seemingly normal life until he is pulled back into the Matrix and has to confront his past once again.

movies.title: Avatar
movies.description: A paraplegic Marine is sent to Pandora, where he becomes torn between following orders and protecting the world he feels is his new home.

movies.title: Titanic
movies.description: A young aristocrat falls in love with a kind but poor artist aboard the luxurious, ill-fated Titanic.

movies.title: Interstellar
movies.description: A group of explorers travel through a wormhole in space in an attempt to ensure humanity's survival.

movies.title: Parasite
movies.description: Greed and class discrimination threaten the newly formed symbiotic relationship between the wealthy Park family and the destitute Kim clan.

movies.title: The Shawshank Redemption
movies.description: Two imprisoned men bond over a number of years, finding solace and eventual redemption through acts of common decency.

movies.title: The Godfather
movies.description: The aging patriarch of an organized crime dynasty transfers control of his clandestine empire to his reluctant son.

movies.title: Pulp Fiction
movies.description: The lives of two mob hitmen, a boxer, a gangster's wife, and a pair of diner bandits intertwine in four tales of violence and redemption.

movies.title: The Lord of the Rings: The Fellowship of the Ring
movies.description: A meek hobbit from the Shire and eight companions set out on a journey to destroy the powerful One Ring and save Middle-earth.

movies.title: The Avengers
movies.description: Earth's mightiest heroes must come together to stop Loki and his alien army from enslaving humanity.

movies.title: Joker
movies.description: A mentally troubled comedian embarks on a downward spiral of social revolution and bloody crime.

movies.title: Frozen
movies.description: When the newly crowned Queen Elsa accidentally uses her power to turn things into ice, her sister, Anna, teams up with a mountain man, his playful reindeer, and a snowman to change the weather condition.

movies.title: Black Panther
movies.description: T'Challa, the heir to the hidden kingdom of Wakanda, must step forward to lead his people into a new future and confront a challenger from his country's past.

movies.title: Guardians of the Galaxy
movies.description: A group of intergalactic criminals must pull together to stop a fanatical warrior from taking control of the universe.

movies.title: Toy Story
movies.description: A cowboy doll is profoundly threatened and jealous when a new spaceman figure supplants him as top toy in a boy's room.

movies.title: Mad Max: Fury Road
movies.description: In a post-apocalyptic wasteland, Max teams up with Furiosa to escape a warlord and his army in a high-octane road chase.

movies.title: Shrek
movies.description: An ogre and a donkey set out to rescue a princess, but their journey is filled with unexpected surprises.

movies.title: The Lion King
movies.description: Lion prince Simba and his father are targeted by his wicked uncle, who wants to rule the kingdom.

movies.title: Doctor Strange
movies.description: A neurosurgeon embarks on a journey of healing, only to be drawn into the world of the mystic arts.

movies.title: Wonder Woman
movies.description: Diana, princess of the Amazons, leaves her island paradise to fight alongside man in a war to end all wars.

movies.title: Coco
movies.description: Aspiring musician Miguel, confronted with his family's ancestral ban on music, enters the Land of the Dead to find his great-great-grandfather, a legendary singer.

movies.title: Trolls
movies.description: After the Bergens invade their village, Poppy, the happiest Troll ever born, and the overly cautious Branch set off on a journey to rescue her friends.

movies.title: The Theory of Everything
movies.description: A look at the relationship between the famous physicist Stephen Hawking and his wife, Jane, as he battles ALS and works on his groundbreaking theories.

movies.title: The Revenant
movies.description: A frontiersman on a fur trading expedition in the 1820s fights for survival after being mauled by a bear and left for dead by members of his hunting team.

movies.title: Tenet
movies.description: Armed with only one word, Tenet, a protagonist journeys through a twilight world of international espionage on a mission that will unfold in something beyond real time.

movies.title: [REC]
movies.description: A reporter and her cameraman are trapped inside a building quarantined by the authorities after an outbreak of a deadly virus.
